name: Spring Flowers
description: This is a game, that I made for the Spring Game Jam 2021. It's about planting some flowers, and taking care of them while you're watching them grow. You have to water them, YEET the weed outta there and fertilise them if you want them to grow faster. When they're finished, they can be harvested and sold to get more seeds or fertiliser.  Your goal is to get to 200 flowers.
